name: Combat Adventure [EA]
description:
Welcome to Combat Adventure! inj this game, you are Joe, a yellow boy that have to save the world from the White Corruption! can you help him to defeat all the bosses without dying?

!!! WARNING !!!

You must download "Scratch Desktop" to play this game!

Scratch - Scratch Offline Editor (mit.edu)

Last Update: 03/01/22:

- The game is in "Early Acces"
